page.title: 02BARNSTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school is set in a residential area where the majority of houses are detached and privately owned. The school itself has a{large {playground}which is marked out for netball,football,hopscotch and number games. There is a good paved area which is set aside for the Infants who can play there safely without being knocked over by the bigger children. There is also a{large field.}This too is marked out for football and has a straight running track.It has trees on three sides and is used for play, rounders, cricket,country dancing with a maypole,Sports Day and Summer Fair. The school has a large{Reference {Library}with over a thousand books and a very good{Fiction Library}which is growing daily.
